creator: kanekotky@gmail.com
text:
fixed typo. Index: xdocs/security-3.xml =================================================================== --- xdocs/security-3.xml (revision 525537) +++ xdocs/security-3.xml (working copy) @@ -165,7 +165,7 @@

important: Information disclosure - CVE-2001-0590

+ CVE-2000-1210

source.jsp, provided as part of the examples, allows an attacker to read arbitary files via a .. (dot dot) in the argument to source.jsp.

Index: docs/security-3.html =================================================================== --- docs/security-3.html (revision 525537) +++ docs/security-3.html (working copy) @@ -544,7 +544,7 @@

important: Information disclosure - CVE-2001-0590 + CVE-2000-1210

creator: kanekotky@gmail.com
text:
Sorry, I found another typo :) Index: xdocs/security-3.xml =================================================================== --- xdocs/security-3.xml (revision 525537) +++ xdocs/security-3.xml (working copy) @@ -165,10 +165,10 @@

important: Information disclosure - CVE-2001-0590

+ CVE-2000-1210

source.jsp, provided as part of the examples, allows an attacker to read - arbitary files via a .. (dot dot) in the argument to source.jsp.

+ arbitrary files via a .. (dot dot) in the argument to source.jsp.

Affects: 3.0

Index: docs/security-3.html =================================================================== --- docs/security-3.html (revision 525537) +++ docs/security-3.html (working copy) @@ -544,12 +544,12 @@

important: Information disclosure - CVE-2001-0590 + CVE-2000-1210

source.jsp, provided as part of the examples, allows an attacker to read - arbitary files via a .. (dot dot) in the argument to source.jsp.

+ arbitrary files via a .. (dot dot) in the argument to source.jsp.

Affects: 3.0
Fixed in svn. Will be updated on the live site shortly. Thanks for the report.
creator: markt@apache.org
